SQL::Connection::DropDatabase() Syntax Result_Flag as L = .DropDatabase( Database_String as C ) ArgumentDescription Result_FlagTRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.). A SQL::Connection object. Database_StringThe name of the database.
Description The DropDatabase() method removes a database. Limitations Examples dim conn as SQL::Connection if .not. conn.open("{A5API=Access, FileName='C:\Databases\Northwind\northwind.mdb', UserName='Admin'}") then ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if if .not. conn.DropDatabase("Northwinds") then ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end if
See Also SQL::Connection Object
